Package com.company.Common.DataSource

Interface OrganisationUnitDataSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCOrganisationUnitDataSource, MockOrgUnitDatabase, OrganisationUnitNDS
public interface OrganisationUnitDataSource

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addOrganisationUnit​(OrganisationUnit organisationUnit)
    Adds a Organisation Unit to the database, if they are not already in the database
    void close()
    Finalizes any resources used by the data source and ensures data is persisted.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object[]> getList()
    Gets list of organisation units

  • Method Details

    • addOrganisationUnit

      void addOrganisationUnit​(OrganisationUnit organisationUnit) throws java.lang.Exception
      Adds a Organisation Unit to the database, if they are not already in the database
      Parameters:
      organisationUnit - OrganisationUnit to add
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if add fails

    • getOrganisationUnit

      OrganisationUnit getOrganisationUnit​(java.lang.Integer organisationUnitID) throws java.lang.Exception
      Extracts all the details of a OrganisationUnit from the database based on the OrganisationUnitID passed in.
      Parameters:
      organisationUnitID - The organisationUnitID as a Integer to search for.
      Returns:
      all details in a OrganisationUnit object for the organisationUnitID
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if get fails

    • close

      void close()
      Finalizes any resources used by the data source and ensures data is persisted.
